NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages 7.30
NewsArticle.Content: On Wednesday, December 21st, Dark Ages will be patching to version 7.30 Itemshop Release 1. Original December Itemshop Items 2. New Items: Engrave Item, Recall Scroll, and Stocking Stuffer 2 Patching Issues with Vista & Windows7: Please "right-click" your Darkages.exe icon and choose "Run as administrator"
